titles.title: Create Jobs by Expanding the R&D Tax Credit Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the credit for research expenses for 2011 and 2012 and to allow the credit to be assigned.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/2011--Introduced. Create Jobs by Expanding the R&D Tax Credit Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the rate of the tax credit for increasing research activities in 2011 and 2012; (2) extend such tax credit through 2012; and (3) allow certain small business concerns to assign research tax credit amounts in 2011 and 2012.
